Body: Whenever I'm done with an application, I always exit using the back button. Somehow applications like Viber, WhatsApp, Facebook, Videos, Email, Google Maps, etc keep restarting on their own. I have tried:Using a task killerForce stopping the apps in the settings menuKilling them using watchdog...but they still restart. Any idea how to solve this problem?
Title: Applications keep restarting

history.Text: Whenever im done with an application i always exit using the back button. But somehow applications like viber, whatsapp, facebook, videos, email, google, map and stuff keep restarting by itself. I have tried using the task killer, it still restarts. Tried force stopping it in settings menu, still restarts. Tried killing it using watchdog, still restarts. Any idea how to solve this problem? thx
Application Keeps restarting in Samsung S Plus

Whenever I'm done with an application I always exit using the back button. But somehow applications like viber, whatsapp, facebook, videos, email, google, map and stuff keep restarting by itself. I have tried using the task killer, it still restarts. Tried force stopping it in settings menu, still restarts. Tried killing it using watchdog, still restarts. Any idea how to solve this problem? Thanks.

history.Text: Whenever I'm done with an application, I always exit using the back button. Somehow applications like Viber, WhatsApp, Facebook, Videos, Email, Google Maps, etc keep restarting on their own. I have tried: - Using a task killer - Force stopping the apps in the settings menu - Killing them using watchdog...but they still restart. Any idea how to solve this problem?
